about_the_game:
Fall of the Mist is an innovative deckbuilding card game. Play cards in a strategic order and according to symbol logic to defeat the Order's opponents.
Make the most of your hand by combining the effects of Class and Mist cards.
Understand the Mist to improve your deck and your equipment and defeat your foes.

Features

  • 200+ cards and power to shape your deck as you wish.
  • Unique way to play and combo your card.
  • Solo game with high replay value.
  • A story driven game

Replay Value

  • 3 different heroes with unique playstyle.
  • Evolutive narration
  • Alternative act.
  • 50+ random events
  • Alternative Modes and difficulties
